summary: In a world where giant humanoid Titans prey on humans, Eren joins the scouting legion to get revenge on the monsters who killed everyone in his town.
cast: Haruma Miura|Kiko Mizuhara|Kanata Hongô|Satomi Ishihara|Nanami Sakuraba|Takahiro Miura|Hiroki Hasegawa|Ayame Misaki|Pierre Taki|Jun Kunimura|Shu Watanabe|Satoru Matsuo|Rina Takeda|Takurô Kodama|Yutaka Mishima|Nana Seino
keywords: titan|giant|humanoid monster|man eating giant|live action remake of anime
title: Ataque a los titanes
